channel.title: docker on Maksym Prokopov personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Maksym Prokopov personal blog

item.title: I discovered much faster way to speed up docker image creation.
item.description: I discovered much faster way to speed up docker image creation. Just use bundle package and all current gems will be copied into vendor/cache. When bundle install runs it discovers cached gems and runs much-much faster.
